name: Fruit Trip
description:
This is a world-popular juice match-3 adventure game!
Ms. Fruit owns a big fruit farm, she loves fruit so much, so she decided to collect all kinds of different fruit from all over the world. Collect the fruits by matching three fruits in same shape and color! Wow, caterpillars are bad guy, let's eliminate them! Wait, we still have pizza and free gifts? Let's figure it out together!

Fruits Trip Features:
★ Subverted the traditional gameplay, challenging like never before
★ Over 100 special and challenging levels, you may never get bored
★ Powerful props will shock you, enjoy the fantastic graphics
★ Fruits crush effects and saga sounds
★ BIG GIFTS are FREE!

Ms. Fruit will accompany you all the time! Download it for FREE!
